hopobject.name: BBB
hopobject.body: A high performance, memory mapped, C++ API for GPIO on the Beaglebone Black. Currently developing high performance analog input, SPI, and I2C. Unlike most APIs that use the linux /device file system for reading and writing to pins, this API uses linux mmap, for direct memory access to pin functionality.
hopobject.shortdesc: BeagleBone Black GPIO, SPI and I2C API using high performance mmap.
